programme.desc: We travel through the mountainous area 100 km northwest of Tokyo, covering Tochigi, Gunma and Saitama Prefectures. We focus on timber and meet local residents who appreciate the blessings of nature.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: People in Japan use roughly 150 new cardboard boxes a year. In a 5-minute digest, we examine a broad range of Japan's innovative cardboard products, including waterproof packaging and emergency goods.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: tiny desk concerts JAPAN
programme.desc: The dynamic sister duo CHARAN-PO-RANTAN celebrates 15 years as a group as they take on the tiny desk!

programme.title: BOSAI: Phreatic Eruptions
programme.desc: In September 2014, a volcano erupted without any warning claiming more than 60 lives. Find out why steam-driven phreatic eruptions are hard to forecast and the latest research on volcanic predictions.

programme.title: Clothes That Transcend Time
programme.desc: Akita / Koike Kazuko (creative director) Nishimonai Bon Odori Festival has continued for over 700 years. Koike finds timeless beauty in the costumes, remade using beloved family kimono.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: SAMURAI WISDOM KURODA KANBEI
programme.desc: Whether outnumbered or laying siege to a seemingly impenetrable fortress, master strategist Kuroda Kanbei used his wits to win on the battlefield.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to shogi. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Gojinjo Taiko is a wild, powerful performance by masked drummers. It originated 400 years ago, when villagers disguised themselves as oni (demons) to scare away a warlord's army.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Ukraine's Women Soldiers
programme.desc: The number of women in the Ukrainian military has soared since the start of the Russian invasion. We follow these soldiers as they face the enemy and their own growing sense of despair.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The Perfect 2-Hour Guide
programme.desc: Explore Izumo Oyashiro, one of Japan's most iconic and sacred shrines. With 1,300 years of history and countless myths, this ultimate two-hour tour reveals its deep spiritual and cultural appeal.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week, angela (a duo popular for anime songs) and SKE48 (a Nagoya-based sister group of AKB48) stop by the studio to chat and perform.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-4.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: In Japan, nostalgia is spreading for the Showa era (1926-1989). We introduce electronics, retro designs, and other elements of a period that many Japanese people consider the "good old days."

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: We take in Japan's tallest mountain, Mt. Fuji, and meet some cats on the way. A cat named Bond carries out top-secret missions at a peach orchard. Another cat patrols its home-a 100-year-old winery.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: We travel the Izumo Highway, which has been used since ages past, and meet people who value human connection, such as a magatama jewelry artisan and a pro wrestler learning farming in a village.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: Listen to the Earth
programme.desc: Leading experts teach us by means of demonstrations and quizzes how to listen to the Earth and prepare for earthquakes, typhoons, volcanoes and other life-threatening natural disasters.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Nancy, a city in the Lorraine region of northeastern France, became famous for its association with the Art Nouveau movement at the end of the 19th century. It is regarded as an open-air "art museum."

programme.title: National Parks of Japan:Kerama
programme.desc: Keramashoto National Park offers pristine waters that support a diverse ecosystem. It's also home to people who proactively carry out conservation activities and proudly carry on a distinct culture.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Through the Kitchen Window
programme.desc: For over 50 years, the Hoshis have been making the same delicious cakes. Peek inside the kitchen of a family bringing a taste of joy to the community.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The perfect shading in beautiful tie-dyed patterns may result from sections randomly touching in the dye. Discover the future of clamp resist dyeing.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Today: saying how much you can do. Naing Myo Oo, from Myanmar, works at a sign-making company. In a roleplay challenge, he must let his supervisor know how much work he can accomplish that day.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Kimura Naoko makes non-toxic crayons from remaindered fruits and vegetables, labeled "apple" or "yam," instead of "red" or "yellow." Her aim is to spread love for earth's bounty.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC297
programme.desc: Strickland vs Du Plessis - For the first time ever, Sphere Las Vegas hosts the UFC, as devastating striker Suga Sean OMalley defends his UFC Middleweight Champion Sean Strickland defends his title against South African contender Dricus Du Plessis in a thrilling showdown at UFC 297. Watch the full championship fight on this episode of Main Event.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC315MuhammadvsDellaMaddalena
programme.desc: When the Octagon returns to Montreal for the first time since 2015, fans are treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena, and Manon Fiorot battles to be the first female French champion against Flyweight phenom Valentina Shevchenko. Plus, the return of Jose Aldo and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep6
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep17
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Ulberg vs. Reyes
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFCs return to Perth on September 28 will feature one of the most explosive members of the Anzac contingent, as New Zealands top light heavyweight contender, Carlos Ulberg attempts to make his case for a world title shot when he faces American standout Dominick Reyes. Winner of eight in a row with five finishes, Ulberg is peaking at the right time after back-to-back wins over Volkan Oezdemir and Jan Blachowicz, and now he has his sights set on ending the winning streak of Reyes, who has knocked out his last three opponents en route to this showdown at RAC Arena
